Andres , the chef and owner of a slew of restaurants from Washington to Las Vegas , began his speech to the graduating class of 2014 with a short film explaining how he wound up with the speaking gig .

Andres befriended some of the celebs - like Paltrow , whose home he 's cooked in - through mutual foodie friends .
